heading: HB02710
0: AN ACT MAKING FIRST-TIME OWNERSHIP EASIER AND MORE AFFORDABLE BY MAKING THE COST OF THE PURCHASE CHEAPER, REDUCING THE FINANCING COST, EXEMPTING THE PURCHASE FROM TAXATION, ENHANCING PRIVATE SECTOR PARTICIPATION IN HOUSING CONSTRUCTION AND FINANCING AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
